meta_title: DSP Regular Savings Fund Direct Growth - Groww
meta_desc: DSP Regular Savings Fund Direct Growth is Conservative Hybrid Hybrid mutual fund with risk-reward rating of 3/10. It has track record of 11 years, with three year return of 9.01. Risk is Moderately High
scheme_name: DSP Regular Savings Fund Direct Growth
fund_manager: Kedar Karnik, Vikram Chopra, Mayur Patel
description: The scheme seeks to generate attractive return, consistent with prudent risk, from a portfolio comprising substantially of quality debt securities. It also aims to generate capital appreciation by investing up to 10 per cent its corpus in equity of 100 largest corporates by market capitalization, listed in India.

analysis.analysis_desc: Consistently higher annualised returns than category average for the past 1Y, 3Y, 5Y and 10Y

amc_info.name: DSP Mutual Fund
amc_info.address: NATRAJ, Office No. 302-3rd Floor-Plot No. 194, MV Road JunctionWestern Express Highway, Andheri East Mumbai 400069
amc_info.description: DSP BlackRock Mutual Fund started their mutual fund on 16/12/1996 and its managing total assets of â‚¹78,763 Cr. Its ranked at 9 as per total assets at end of 30th Sep 2017.
amc_info.more_description:
DSP group is a financial firm with a legacy of 152 years. It has a been in the asset management avenue for over 20 years now and the group is headed by Mr.Hemendra Kothari.

DSP Investment Managers Pvt. Ltd. is the Asset management Company and DSP Trustee Pvt. Ltd, acts as the trustee of the AMC. The company believes that by using adequate investment strategies, it is relatively easy to be successful in the financial market. It provides a wide range of mutual fund scheme ranging from equity, debt, tax and hybrid. The AMC has always managed to keep the returns consistent and they have a brilliant investor base as well.

The AMC believes in taking measured risks, which ultimately results in understanding the market conditions better and makes the best use of the investment opportunity. With a robust variety of products and consistent performance, DSP mutual fund has made a name for itself in the mutual fund industry.

category_info.tax_impact: Returns are taxed as per your Income Tax slab.
category_info.description: Invest predominantly in Government Securities(minimum 80% of total assets). They are relatively more risky than the other debt funds due to fluctuating interest rates.
